info.name: DeviantArt - Folders on the Left With Thumbnail
info.description: Move the Folders buttons on the left while keeping the thumbnail, reminiscence of V7. Works on Gallery and Favorites.
info.additionalInfo:
-Only work while login. While log out, the ads mess it up.

8 February 2023
-Fixed the folder display in "Add Deviations" tab
-Changing height for the Folder button in "Add Deviation Tab"

11 February 2023
-Fixed Search Bar in Gallery
- Reverted the text result display fix because it doesn't let the folder to be on the left

17 Ferbuary 2023
-Added Attribute for "No Result" window in Gallery Search

4th May of 2023
-Fixed bug that hide the arrow for "Latest Deviations" widget on the Profile Page
